resources.string: Require Password to Log In Remotely
Block Mole Control Texts from Reaching Inbox
Enter your information and preferences for panic mode: \n\n The top box is the Large Text that will appear on the screen when you send the panic command and the Bottom is the caption.
This is the log of all times in which someone accessed or tried to access mole service.
Caesura Service is Currently Under Someone Else\'s Control
Access denied. User Already Logged In.
Caesura Service: Enter your password or send exit to quit
Caesura Service Activated. Type exit to Log out.
Incorrect Password. Try again or send exit to quit.
Access Denied. Incorrect Password. Send exit to quit
Caesura is already logged in on this phone. Type exit to log out.
Error Lighting Torch. Insure that device has LED flash and supports Torch mode.
Type help [commandname] for help with a specific command.
No help is available for this command.
Status. Simple information about the current state of the device.
Caesura supports a system known as SMS Interception. This system can be useful for allowing parents to screen their children\'s text messages, and even read them.
This command unlocks the keys on a password protected device. The password will be disabled while Caesura is enabled.
Enter a number to be blocked or forwarded from this phone.

Welcome to Caesura\'s SmsFilter Labratory. In this window, you can either block texts from certain numbers or forward texts.\n\nBefore you can forward texts, you must configure this option by pressing the Options Button.
Error. Either this number is already blocked or it is less than 10 digits long.
Please enter a phone number for SMS messages to be forwarded to:
Error. This is not a valid mobile phone number.
Incorrect Argument: block [10 digit phone number]
The specified number is not blocked.
Incorrect Argument: forward [10 digit phone number]
This number is not being forwarded.
Incorrect Argument: forwardto [10 digit mobile phone number]

Caesura Remote Administration
By: Christian Gunderman
v%V Build %B

Take control of your phone...and possibly the world :P

Developed by Gundersoft in Hillsboro

gundermanc@gmail.com
www.gundersoft.com
Welcome to Caesura Command Console. Commands may be selected from the dropdown list at the bottom of the screen.
Enter the telephone number of the phone you wish to connect to:
The value given is not a valid 10 digit phone number.
Logging out of Caesura. CLEAR SMS OUTBOX TO PROTECT PASSWORD!"
Welcome to the Location Features Settings
Can not send blank command\nPlease select a command and try again.
Missing Argument: contacts [command] [name]. The following are commands: search, getphone, setphone.
Error, selected user has no associated phone number.
Notify Me when a Phone Control Message is Received

STOP!!!!!!!

Read this first:
You have just selected to remove the Caesura icon from the Android launcher. Please Note: by removing the icon, you are removing it for good, also disabling ALL elements of the UI. From this point on, you will only be able to interact with Caesura through the remote login system.

Furthermore, installation of Caesura upon the device of another person without consent with the intention of spying upon him or her is illegal. Do you wish to continue anyway? By pressing yes, you are agreeing to release Christian Gunderman from all liability and are accepting full responsibility for the usage of this application and any/all repercussions.
Reboot device now for changes to take effect.
Missing/Incorrect Argument: call [10 digit phone number] [SPEAKER/NORMAL]
Caesura has detected that your phone does not yet have TTS (Text To Speech) installed. TTS is required to use the SPEAK function.\n\nWould you like to download it now?
Caesura will function normally except for the TTS. No commands involving spoken text will work until you install TTS.
TextToSpeech initialization failed! Language is not available.
TextToSpeech initialization failed! Insure that TTS data is installed.
TTS was off and is starting up. Send message again.
Requires one argument. Speak [text to be spoken]
volume [stream] [operation] \nStreams: media, notifications, alarm, dtmf, ring, sys, call\nOperations: mute, unmute , [0-20 volume level]
Speakerphone. Toggles speakerphone on or off during a call.
Wifi. Toggles the power to the WIFI radio on the device.
Gps. Toggles power to the GPS radio. May be unavailable on some phones.
Sorry, your device is incompatible with GPS toggle.
Toast [ticker] [text] Displays a notification in the status bar.
Torch. Toggles LED camera flash/flashlight on phone.
Panic. Causes phone to ring loudly and flash camera flash and display Panic Mode Information.
Call [number] [option] Dials a phone number. Specify SPEAKER for option to call on speakerphone.
Block [number] Blocks SMS messages from the specified number
Unblock [number] Unblocks SMS messages from specified number.
Blocked. Returns the list of blocked numbers.
Forward [number] forwards all text messages from this number to the number selected with the forwardto command.
Unforward [number] stops forwarding all text messages from specified number.
Forwarded. Returns list of numbers being forwarded to the number specified with the Forwardto command.
Forwardto [number] sets the number to which all forwarded texts will be sent.
Contacts [command] [query] can be used to find/get phone numbers from address book. Command can be search or getphone.
More. Gets the rest of the msg when msg ends with ...more
Exit. Logs you out of Caesura. DOES NOT DISABLE PANIC OR TORCH!
Welcome to Caesura Settings. Press one of the buttons or checkboxes below to make a selection.
Its been ten minutes and no cmds...Caesura Logging out
Please leave me some good feedback! It allows me to keep developing and keep this app free for you :D
Fill out the email template below and please allow up to two weeks for a response. I am a busy guy and may take some time to get back to you.
Caesura Cmds; Text more for more:

Thank you for choosing Caesura. For more information and step-by-step instructions on how to use Caesura, on your computer, visit:


 www.gundersoft.com/caesura
